value:
$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Uhn...$k$pWhere...am I?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|You're awake! Now, that's a relief.$k$pHere, have some water.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Thank you. Were you the one who
saved me?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|It wasn't me. No, only one person in
our army could find you passed out
in the snow...$k$p$EFace_Smile|It was $Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Then you have my sincere gratitude,
$Nu.$k$pMy name is Fjorm. I am... I was...a
princess of the Kingdom of Nifl.$k$p$EFace_Anger|My homeland, however, was
destroyed by the Fiery Hordes of our
enemy, Múspell.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|"Fiery Hordes"? Then, they—$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes. They're the ones launching an
invasion of your kingdom right now.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Then it's our duty to face them.
Princess, you should rest. You can—$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|I'm sorry to interrupt you, but there's
no way I can do that. You must let me
come with you. Please.$k$pMy homeland was destroyed by King
Surtr of Múspell. But not only that... I
watched as he killed my mother.$k$pI can't let the same thing happen to
your kingdom. Please, whatever
strength I have...let me lend it to you.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|You're still alive. How disappointing.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Princess Veronica! Tell me what you
know about these invaders from
Múspell!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|They're my allies, of course. I've
joined forces with King Surtr...$k$pMy Heroes and my soldiers will assist
however they can. After all...$k$pAskr must be destroyed.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|I tire of this. I'm heading back to the
castle. Don't forget, though... I will
kill all of you. Surtr will see to that.$k$p
